name: EDD-Gifting Addon
author: WPProKing

sections.description:
Do you use Easy Digital Download plugin like the other 40,000+ users?

Easy Digital Download has an exciting new addon which will make gifting digital deals smooth as a breeze.

This easy peasy addon will take in receivers email address and your very own personalized message and voila! A digital gift will land up in the receivers mail box with the senders personal message.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Looks great, now you will have an extra section on the “Checkout Page” for allowing the user to gift the digital product.
sections.faq: Is there anything stopping you from using this plugin? Ask us now!
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Version of the EDD – Gifting Addon

short_description: Gifting Addon for Easy Digital Downloads which allows you to send the download link to another person
